content: Finished the first one way back when it launched on pc, I remember trying this one too when it came out but the slow nature of point and click adventure games makes them more suitable for a tablet rather than an office pc, so I bought it on Android.

Really really disappointed with this, I paid for the game only for there to be a glitch near the end not giving me an option to go back to the passage. Feel as I've been ripped off. Played almost the whole thing for nothing

The controls are different from the first game so pepare for that if you're playing back to back. When you need to change into the costume the second time, double click on the costume in your inventory. I spent too many hours banging my head against the wall over that control malfunction. The length of the game was great. Overall, it was a great game & worth the money.
I want to give 5 stars but the game is bugged. After the ship wreck on the beech it will not give me the option to click on the wooden box or barrel meaning I'm now stuck
replyContent: Hello and thank you for your review. We changed the puzzle at the beach for the mobile version of Secret Files 2 in order to simplify this sequence. The objects you are refering to are no longer needed to solve the puzzle. Please try again and get in touch via support@animationarts.de if you are still stuck. Thank you.

content: Great sequel and point click adventure with challenging inventory puzzles, fun dialogues.
I love games like this where you walk the person I guess point and click is what it called if only there was more games like that like Nancy drew or like this one

For some reason the Bell cannot be attached to the bolt on the wall, it's seems the screen recognizes the bolt alone, but when you try to attach the Bell on the wall, it doesn't show on the screen so I'm stuck on this and move further in the game!!! I paid for this and I cannot finish the game, on my Android phone..... seriously....really.....not good at all!
Fabulous Game all of your games are
Great puzzles. Controls a bit awkward, otherwise a very nice game

Could not even open game. It installed fine but is STUCK on intro screen. First installment, Tunguska, played just fine and was enjoyable. What's different with this one. Hint: don't fix it if it isn't broke...

Against my better judgment I installed this game even after seeing all of the negative reviews. I can't even do one of the most basic actions which is to combine two items in my inventory which means I can't advance further than the start of the game.
interesting story line, long play time, great graphics
first game was great in every way, this is pretty dreadful. voice acting is dire, puzzles dont make any sense, really disappointed after the quality of the first one

Since the latest update, my saved position won't load. I was more than halfway through. I doubt I will start again. The first game was great, but this has been a slow-loading laborious process that has detracted from the (actually good) game. However, this latest issue means that I accept defeat. They have my money. I wish them, and you, luck!
like the game but can't finish it. suppost to use bust on hatch but wont let me. hatch doesnt even show up when i try to use the bust on it
Great game. No issues

When a game has been paid for there is an expectation that it will work. There appears to be a bug/glitch with the fruit basket. Two pieces of fruit are in the inventory, however, Sam won't take another, that she has three pieces of fruit already. Extremely annoying. If I cannot finish the game due to this then I should be getting a refund.
Can't get past load screen. Really disappointed. Lots of memory on device. Refund please. Update. Ten days on. No response and no refund. Very annoyed.
i enjoyed 1st completely i wanted to get right into this one ... BUT I'M SO STUCK ON GETTING PAST OR IN WITH THE SCREWDRIVER THE PART WHERE THE TOOMBS ARE???? HELP
keeps crashing when trying to select items in inventory rubbish
replyContent: Could you please specify which item produces this problem? We can't reproduce a crash when using the inventory.

content: game has lots of action locations near the edge of the screen and often will not display. Cannot move past the temple back door since the slug is off screen

i enjoyed this game & it was running fine until an update last year- it crashes everytime i launched. i downloaded it again this year when i got a new (6GB RAM) full screen phone. Started the game from the beginning & i couldn't touch-click certain task location/spot -such as cleaning the dirty skylight (ship) window after assembled the task equipment -because the location/spot button is outside of the widescreen view. i can only see the bottom tip of the button when i click manifying glass icon.
Now having trouble where there is supposed to be a magazine in cabin 2, I can't see it on my phone. Can't move forward in game with out the magazine. Hope I can Get Help With this. Uninstalling!!!
Very nice game, there's a lot of work and love in this. The first part was better but it is a very good sequel, indeed.
It was a lovely game. It stopped working with the new up date. I am disappointed that I will not get to finish the game.

Really wanted to play this as just finished the first game in the series, 
so even though it warned it may not be optimized for my console (samsung 
tablet)I installed it and was happy when it appeared to instal and 
played... but it got to the bit where parry opens the window and went black 
screen... so I uninstalled it, & received a refund.... Today I installed an 
sd card and wondered if it had been a space problem, so I paid again and 
tried to play it.. but again it went blackscreen, so I uninstalled it 
through Playstore again, but this time I didn't receive a refund.... I am 
sure if I could install it I would love it... but would have been nice to 
be refunded again when it didn't play too....
A great game

Having the same problem as Laura P. I am in the temple, as Max, and can not 
use items from my inventory. This renders the game unplayable. Very 
disappointing for a highly priced game which I bought having loved Secret 
Files 1 Tunguska! I'll revise review if this is fixed. UPDATE: I installed 
this on a different device and did not have the same problem. Loved the 
actual game but the one star review stands as the company hasn't fixed the 
problem or responded to this review.

You know when a game is so convoluted and difficult to advance you lose all 
pleasure. This is way more difficult than it really has to be.

Was a good game, needed walkthrough a lot though. At last part of the game 
though and none of the items are showing up in the inventory, so is 
unplayable!

There are some short cuts in the story comparing to PC version which usually is OK, but the ending could be left as in the original version. Controls are OK, but sometimes not obvious. In general I liked it a lot.
Same problem as laura p

This is a really tricky point and click adventure. Some of the puzzles are pretty obtuse so expect to have to use a walkthrough occasionally. The controls are good. The graphics are nice enough. The dialogue is quite witty at times, with plenty of breaking the fourth wall. The story is utter nonsense, but that's what makes this kind of game so much fun!

Love the game so far ,but I am also stuck in the cave behind the scary face ,it won't let me take stuff from the inventory &put in the hole .I can't go any further in the game & if just paid nearly Â£4.50 for it I'm gutted
I absolutely love this game. The only complaint I have at this point is that I can't get Max to use the get hat.other than that it is the best game I have played.
Fun, clever, oh did I say fun. Good story. Good graphics. Great adventure game.

Awesome. So much better than the 1st. The controls are standard and easy to use. There's an autosave and manual save (which is extremely important to the standard gamer). The story grabs you and keeps you interested by toggling between 3 different characters. The puzzles are solvable and logical. It's very difficult to put down. Amazing job devs. Can't wait for Monolith!!!
Couldn't finish  game because items i needed  to continue weren't there pissed off
replyContent: Hello, please note that we changed some parts of the gameplay for the mobile version. We reduced the number of useful objects in the beach location for example. All parts can be solved but don`t stricty follow the walkthrough of the old PC version.

content: I am currently stuck and need some guidance... I am at the point in the game where Sam is still cashed and guarded in front of the temple face,  and max is inside the temple with the back side of the temple face revealed, and I am able to switch between the two characters in order to free Sam. However, any time I am playing as max and [only while] inside the temple, I am unable to use items from my inventory. I can only click to get descriptions of the items and I cannot drag anything from its anchor point. I have tried re starting from earlier save point, re-booting the game and my phone, and am unable to resolve this dilemma and continue the game.  PLEASE HELP
I love adventure games, but the puzzles in this game... are just not fun. I honestly don't know how it got such a high rating.
Loved the story, graphics, but too much time spent walking around and in conversation. Also, thought controls was confusing and didn't know what to do next so just watched it on you tube
